channel.title: Flower on Misa's Odekake Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Flower on Misa's Odekake Blog

item.title: Hydrangea field in Ohno Alps land
item.description: I went for a trip to enjoy seeing a “Hygandrea” field at the top of Mt. Ohno in Inagawa town. We arrived there by car, however the road was narrow and the fog was terrible that day, so we drove carefully. Hyndrangeas during fog are nice too look at and the atmosphere seems to be so calm. The best season for flowers is on June and July, but I heard

item.title: Aramaki Rose Park
item.description: I went to Aramaki Rose Park by bicycle. A lot of different roses were blooming in the large and splendid park. Admission is free. Isnâ€™t it something!? Sprinkler’s water splashed when watering time. Children were excited getting wet. I almost got wet too. I recommend families with children to bring spare clothes.
